statements: SELECT * FROM call_detail_records;
SELECT user_id, call_duration FROM call_detail_records;
SELECT record_id, user_id, call_duration, call_quality FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_quality = 'good';
SELECT * FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_duration > 10;
SELECT record_id, user_id, signal_strength FROM call_detail_records ORDER BY signal_strength DESC;
SELECT * FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_duration > 10 ORDER BY record_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, call_duration, call_quality FROM call_detail_records WHERE signal_strength > 50 ORDER BY call_duration ASC
SELECT record_id, user_id FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_quality = 'good'
SELECT * FROM call_detail_records WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY signal_strength DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT user_id, call_quality FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_duration BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT * FROM call_detail_records WHERE caller_number = '1234567890';
SELECT record_id, timestamp, call_duration FROM call_detail_records WHERE receiver_number = '0987654321';
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number, quality_of_service FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_duration > 60;
SELECT * FROM network_optimization WHERE optimization_type = 'Traffic Optimization' ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT optimization_id, optimization_type, date_created, last_updated FROM network_optimization ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_duration > 300 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number, quality_of_service FROM call_detail_records WHERE quality_of_service >= 4 ORDER BY quality_of_service DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_optimization WHERE optimization_type = 'Network Security' ORDER BY date_created ASC, last_updated DESC;
SELECT optimization_id, optimization_type, optimization_description FROM network_optimization ORDER BY optimization_type ASC, last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number, call_duration FROM call_detail_records WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY call_duration DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM call_detail_records;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type FROM network_providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT record_id, call_duration FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_quality_rating = 5;
SELECT * FROM network_performance WHERE download_speed > 100 AND upload_speed > 50 ORDER BY download_speed DESC, upload_speed DESC;
SELECT provider_name, download_speed, upload_speed FROM network_providers JOIN network_performance ON network_providers.provider_id = network_performance.provider_id;
SELECT * FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_duration > '00:10:00' ORDER BY call_quality_rating DESC
SELECT provider_name, provider_type FROM network_providers WHERE provider_type = 'Mobile'
SELECT call_duration, call_quality_rating FROM call_detail_records WHERE phone_number = '+1234567890'
SELECT provider_name, provider_type, download_speed, upload_speed FROM network_providers JOIN network_performance ON network_providers.provider_id = network_performance.provider_id
SELECT * FROM call_detail_records JOIN network_providers ON call_detail_records.record_id = network_providers.provider_id
SELECT * FROM call_detail_records;
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number, call_duration FROM call_detail_records WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM network_performance ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_name, os_version FROM user_devices WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT area_name, signal_strength FROM coverage_area WHERE connected_users > 50;
SELECT * FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_duration > 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT timestamp, caller_number, receiver_number FROM call_detail_records WHERE caller_number = '+1234567890' AND receiver_number = '+9876543210';
SELECT AVG(call_duration) AS avg_duration, MAX(call_duration) AS max_duration, MIN(call_duration) AS min_duration FROM call_detail_records;
SELECT device_name, os_version FROM user_devices WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT area_name, signal_strength FROM coverage_area WHERE connected_users > 10 ORDER BY signal_strength DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM call_records;
SELECT user_name, user_location FROM user_details WHERE user_location='New York';
SELECT provider_name, provider_type FROM service_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_statistics WHERE download_speed > 100 AND upload_speed < 50;
SELECT call_date, call_quality FROM call_records WHERE call_duration > 60;
SELECT * FROM call_records WHERE call_duration > 300;
SELECT user_name, user_location FROM user_details WHERE user_location = 'New York';
SELECT provider_name, provider_type FROM service_providers WHERE provider_type = 'Internet';
SELECT * FROM network_statistics ORDER BY download_speed DESC;
SELECT tower_id, location, operator FROM cell_towers WHERE coverage_area > 1000;
